briefdescription.para: Flag forcing ANSI escape code colors, red (errors), yellow (warnings).
Flag forcing timestamp.
Flag forcing timestamp formatting.
Flag forcing severity level prefix.
Flag preventing the logger from adding CR and LF characters.
Flag forcing a single LF character for line breaks.
Flag forcing syslog format specified in RFC 5424.
Flag forcing syslog format specified in mipi sys-t.

memberdef.name: LOG_OUTPUT_DEFINE
memberdef.initializer: static struct log_output_control_block _name##_control_block; \ static const struct log_output _name = { \ .func = _func, \ .control_block = &_name##_control_block, \ .buf = _buf, \ .size = _size, \ }

briefdescription.para: Create log_output instance.

memberdef.definition: typedef int(* log_output_func_t) (uint8_t *buf, size_t size, void *ctx)
memberdef.name: log_output_func_t

briefdescription.para: Prototype of the function processing output data.

simplesect.para: Number of bytes processed, dropped or discarded.

If the log output function cannot process all of the data, it is its responsibility to mark them as dropped or discarded by returning the corresponding number of bytes dropped or discarded to the caller.

memberdef.argsstring: (const struct log_output *output, struct log_msg *msg, uint32_t flags)
memberdef.name: log_output_msg_process

briefdescription.para: Process log messages to readable strings.

detaileddescription.para: Function is using provided context with the buffer and output function to process formatted string and output the data.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the log output instance.

memberdef.argsstring: (const struct log_output *log_output, struct log_msg2 *msg, uint32_t flags)

briefdescription.para: Process log messages v2 to readable strings.

briefdescription.para: Process log string.

detaileddescription.para: Function is formatting provided string adding optional prefixes and postfixes.

memberdef.argsstring: (const struct log_output *output, struct log_msg_ids src_level, uint32_t timestamp, const char *metadata, const uint8_t *data, uint32_t length, uint32_t flags)

detaileddescription.para: Function is formatting provided hexdump adding optional prefixes and postfixes.
